name: Trip World
overview: Trip World is a cute platform game starring the innocent-looking - yet heroic - Yakopoo, who can transform into various different forms. When their symbol of peace, the Flower of Maita, is stolen, the people of Shabubu begin fighting each other. Even the grass and plants are in a frenzy! Only Yakopoo can save the day. Advance through each world by using Yakopoo's transformations: fly, swim, become a bouncing ball and more, all to retrieve the flower.
